metadata.title: CVE-2019-9873 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In several versions of JetBrains IntelliJ IDEA Ultimate, creating Task Servers configurations leads to saving a cleartext unencrypted record of the server credentials in the IDE configuration files. The issue has been fixed in the following versions: 2019.1, 2018.3.5, 2018.2.8, and 2018.1.8.

criterions.comment: intellij-community-idea package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
